name: Zone
description: Trigger when a player is in the zone from [ax, ay] to [bx, by].

name: Spawn
description: Trigger once when player join the server.

name: HaveItem
description: Trigger when a player has a specific item in inventory.

name: Kill
description: Trigger when a player gets a kill. If nb is given, trigger only when amount is reached.

name: TimerStartIn
description: Trigger after X seconds. When re-enabled, timer restarts from 0.

name: HungerGameStop
description: Trigger when all survivors are dead. Hunger game starts with 'start-hunger-game'.

name: PlacedBuilding
description: Trigger when a player places a building with a specific max-life.

name: DropItem
description: Trigger when a player drops an item. Also triggers when an item is removed with remove-to. Only one event per second.

name: Message
description: Trigger when a player sends a specific message.

name: ZoneHaveItem
description: Trigger when a player is inside a zone AND has a specific item.

name: HasData
description: Trigger when required data is linked. If 'global' true: triggers from global data list; 'ids' for required ids; 'exclude' for excluded ids.

name: HasVerified
description: Trigger once when a player logs in.
